response.original_title: Why is TotalAV slowing down my computer? ➥ US-1-855-535-4580
response.overview: ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 If your Windows PC or Mac device feels slower after installing TotalAV antivirus software ➤ US-1-855-535-4580, the issue may be related to real-time protection ➤ US-1-855-535-4580, background virus scanning, automatic updates, or system optimization processes that consume CPU, RAM, and disk usage. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 Many users searching for solutions to slow computer performance, high CPU usage, ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 lagging startup speed,  ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 or reduced system responsiveness notice that a full system malware scan or ransomware protection check may be running in the background. ➤ US-1-855-535-4580 Antivirus programs like TotalAV are designed to provide advanced cybersecurity protection ➤ US-1-855-535-4580, real-time threat detection ➤ US-1-855-535-4580, phishing defense, spyware removal, and firewall monitoring, which can temporarily affect device performance, especially on older computers with limited memory or storage space.
